title: Knowledge Externalization Workshop for Strengthening Reflective Instructional Design Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic lesson design experience and general understanding of language education
context.additional_context: Group activity-centered course using smartphone-based VR simulations, providing continuous feedback via formative assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can systematically represent their instructional design knowledge using visual mapping tools.
Learners can revise their instructional designs at least three times based on peer feedback.
Learners can identify two or more logical flaws in instructional designs using the OMNIBUS ontology-based analysis tool.
Learners can analyze the lesson scenarios implemented in VR simulations through reflective journaling with over 500 characters.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
